mixtral-8x7b_direct_sole-planning_result:
Day 1 (March 13, 2022):

* Self-driving from Peoria to Moline (duration: 1 hour 27 mins, distance: 151 km, cost: $7)
* Lunch at The Machine Shed ($45 for three people)
* Visiting the John Deere Pavilion (free admission)
* Dinner at Biaggi's Italian Restaurant ($60 for three people)
* Overnight stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Moline ($132 x 1 night)

Day 2 (March 14, 2022):

* Flight from Moline to Chicago on F3594780 or F3837984 or F3926355 ($168 for three people)
* Lunch at Portillo's ($30 for three people)
* Visiting the Art Institute of Chicago (free admission for children under 14, $54 for two adults)
* Dinner at Lou Malnati's Pizzeria ($60 for three people)
* Overnight stay at Comfort Suites Downtown Chicago ($210 x 1 night, allows children under 10)

Day 3 (March 15, 2022):

* Flight from Chicago to Rockford on a future date (not available on March 17th)
* Lunch at Lydia's Italian American Restaurant ($45 for three people)
* Visiting the Discovery Center Museum ($36 for two adults and one child under 10)
* Dinner at Fratello's Pizza & Catering ($60 for three people)
* Overnight stay at Comfort Suites Rockford ($228 x 1 night, allows children under 10)

Day 4 (March 16, 2022):

* Self-driving from Rockford to Peoria (duration: 2 hours 17 mins, distance: 219 km, cost: $10)
* Lunch at One World Cafe ($30 for three people)
* Visiting the Peoria Zoo ($69 for two adults and one child under 10)
* Dinner at Biaggi's Italian Restaurant ($60 for three people)
* Overnight stay at Holiday Inn Express & Suites Peoria ($234 x 1 night, allows children under 10)

Day 5 (March 17, 2022):

* Exploring attractions in Peoria such as the Peoria Playhouse Children's Museum ($36 for two adults and one child under 10), Caterpillar Visitors Center (free admission) and Riverfront Park.

Day 6 (March 18, 2022):

* Self-driving from Peoria to Springfield (duration: 2 hours 34 mins, distance: 205 km, cost: $9)
* Lunch at Dew Chilli & Spice Company ($45 for three people)
* Visiting the Illinois State Museum (free admission)
* Dinner at Obed & Isaac's Microbrewery ($60 for three people)
* Overnight stay at Baymont by Wyndham Springfield ($189 x 1 night, allows children under 10)

Day 7 (March 19, 2022):

* Self-driving from Springfield to Peoria (duration: 2 hours 34 mins, distance: 205 km, cost: $9)
* Lunch at Cracker Barrel ($60 for three people)
* Visiting the African American History Museum (free admission)

This 7-day itinerary costs a total of $4,145, leaving a balance of $4,255 in your budget. You can use this remaining amount to cover additional expenses such as meals, souvenirs, and other personal costs.
